title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Key Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: A Comprehensive Report on Recent Anti-Terror Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Launch sites, military buildings and terror infrastructures; The IDF has completed another attack on a series of terror targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory.

A short while ago, Air Force fighter jets attacked a series of targets of the Hezbollah terror organization, including military buildings, launch sites and terror infrastructures.

In addition, in the past few hours, several launches from Lebanese territory to Israeli territory have been identified. The IDF attacked with artillery in Lebanese territory.

Also, earlier today, IDF fighters attacked two suspects who operated in a known launch area of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3Nw0igz
